relatedRecords.name: Open Source Community Conference (OSCONF) 2020 Kochi
relatedRecords.description: OSCONF is a platform built to connect & bring all leading Meetup communities, Cloud native experts, Evangelists & DevOps together under one roof. It is a non-profit community event which allows you to interact with community leaders, ambassadors & open community contributors.

relatedRecords.name: Remote Work Summit 2020
relatedRecords.description: WORLD’S LARGEST REMOTE WORK CONFERENCE THE REMOTE WORK SUMMIT 2020 Build Your Remote - Attend Online: 14 - 16 April 2020 ​ 11,000+ Professionals Will Attend Online. Will You? Remote work (full-time work-from-home) is supposed to be the one real benefit of the internet. We got ‘TikTok’ instead. (Sic)…
